memberdef.definition: typedef int8_t(* bme280_com_fptr_t) (uint8_t dev_id, uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *data, uint16_t len)
memberdef.argsstring: )(uint8_t dev_id, uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *data, uint16_t len)
memberdef.name: bme280_com_fptr_t

sectiondef.header: Macro to combine two 8 bit data's to form a 16 bit data

description.para: These values are internal for API implementation. Don't relate this to data sheet.

briefdescription.para: This API is the entry point. It reads the chip-id and calibration data from the sensor.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t *reg_addr, const uint8_t *reg_data, uint8_t len, const struct bme280_dev *dev)
memberdef.name: bme280_set_regs

briefdescription.para: This API writes the given data to the register address of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Register address from where the data to be written.
: Pointer to data buffer which is to be written in the sensor.
: No of bytes of data to write..

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t reg_addr, uint8_t *reg_data, uint16_t len, const struct bme280_dev *dev)
memberdef.name: bme280_get_regs

briefdescription.para: This API reads the data from the given register address of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Register address from where the data to be read
: Pointer to data buffer to store the read data.
: No of bytes of data to be read.

briefdescription.para: This API sets the oversampling, filter and standby duration (normal mode) settings in the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Variable used to select the settings which are to be set in the sensor.

simplesect.para: : Below are the macros to be used by the user for selecting the desired settings. User can do OR operation of these macros for configuring multiple settings.

briefdescription.para: This API gets the oversampling, filter and standby duration (normal mode) settings from the sensor.
This API sets the power mode of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Variable which contains the power mode to be set.

briefdescription.para: This API gets the power mode of the sensor.

parameterdescription.para: : Pointer variable to store the power mode.

briefdescription.para: This API performs the soft reset of the sensor.
This API reads the pressure, temperature and humidity data from the sensor, compensates the data and store it in the bme280_data structure instance passed by the user.

parameterdescription.para: : Variable which selects which data to be read from the sensor.

briefdescription.para: This API is used to parse the pressure, temperature and humidity data and store it in the bme280_uncomp_data structure instance.

parameterdescription.para: : Contains register data which needs to be parsed
: Contains the uncompensated pressure, temperature and humidity data.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t sensor_comp, const struct bme280_uncomp_data *uncomp_data, struct bme280_data *comp_data, struct bme280_calib_data *calib_data)
memberdef.name: bme280_compensate_data

briefdescription.para: This API is used to compensate the pressure and/or temperature and/or humidity data according to the component selected by the user.

parameterdescription.para: : Used to select pressure and/or temperature and/or humidity.
: Contains the uncompensated pressure, temperature and humidity data.
: Contains the compensated pressure and/or temperature and/or humidity data.
: Pointer to the calibration data structure.
